p: In addition, the OMVs-H1/RBD vaccinated mice showed a significant increase of neutralizing antibodies against the MERS-CoV strain HKU-NRCE-270 at week 2 and reached the highest neutralizing titer 160 (7.3 log2) at week eight compared to the control group ( p < 0.001) ( Figure 2c and Figure 3a). Control (1× PBS), inactivated H1N1pdm2009 and OMVs-empty groups showed no neutralizing antibodies against MERS-CoV during the eight weeks of infection ( Figure 3b–d).
